name: Trendpoker 3D: Free Online Poker
description:
Are you a rookie? Or a professional? Whatever!

Play Online Poker without restriction or cost! Compete with community, your friends or family with this truly free Texas Hold'em Poker.

In No Limit, Pot Limit, Split Limit poker you can train and improve your poker skills - or just play for fun.

Features:

  • Play online for free: only few clicks and seconds to start
  • All limit types: No limit, pot limit and split limit
  • Environment configurable: 10 different tables and environments available
  • Chips and card design configurable: Dollar or Euro chips or Euro coins
  • Realistic full 3D-animated graphics, voice output and sound effects
  • Tutorial and detailed game help
